description: The Israeli Occupation Forces (IOF) acknowledged the death of another senior officer who had sustained serious injuries in the battles raging in the northern Gaza Strip.
title: Israeli army casualties continue to rise

description: A new Israeli opinion poll indicates that nearly two-thirds of the Israeli public in the occupied lands do not believe in Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s ability to achieve "absolute victory" against Hamas, in a stark contrast to the results of similar polls conducted in January this year.
title: Israeli poll suggests no trust in Netanyahu

description: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange has been given permission to appeal against an extradition case that would see him deported to the United States after arguing at a British High Court that he might not be able to rely on his right to free speech in America.
title: Assange allowed to appeal extradition to U.S.

description: TEHRAN – In an interview on Monday, Indian Ambassador to Tehran, Rudra Gaurav Shresth, offered his perspectives on Iranian martyr Amir Abdollahian.
title: Indian ambassador shares insights on Martyr Amir Abdollahian

description: TEHRAN - The Pakistani Ambassador to Tehran, in an interview with the Tehran Times, has stated that as a gesture of solidarity with the Iranian nation, the “Pakistani flag will be flown at half-mast.”
title: Pakistani Ambassador mourns tragic loss of president, FM

description: TEHRAN - The second edition of the Sobh Media Festival took place on Sunday evening, featuring keynote speakers who are predominantly journalists discussing the pressing issue of Gaza.
title: Second Sobh Media Festival held in Tehran

description: TEHRAN - In a commentary, Hamshahri dealt with abusing Raisi's martyrdom by Israeli enemies and mercenaries to create controversy.
title: Martyrdom of president ignites Israeli propaganda

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Deputy Foreign Ministers held a meeting on Monday following the tragic passing of Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian, who lost his life a day earlier during a plane crash in northwestern Iran.
title: Deputy Foreign Ministers convene meeting after martyrdom of Amir Abdollahian

description: TEHRAN – Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and his accompanying delegation tragically lost their lives in a helicopter crash that occurred in the Dizmar forest in East Azarbaijan Province on Sunday.
title: Preparation of bodies of President Raisi, delegation underway ahead of funeral

description: TEHRAN - The Chief of Joint Staff of Iran’s Armed Forces has ordered an investigation into the causes of the helicopter crash that resulted in the martyrdom of President Ebrahim Raisi and his entourage.
title: Iranian military chief orders investigation into President Raisi’s helicopter crash

description: TEHRAN - Prominent Iranian figures have expressed profound condolences over the martyrdom of President Ebrahim Raisi and his entourage on Sunday.
title: Iranian figures express deep condolences over President Raisi's martyrdom

description: TEHRAN- Leaders from around the world have expressed condolences and shock at the tragic deaths of President Ebrahim Raisi, Foreign Minister Hossein Amir-Abdollahian, and seven others in a helicopter crash in Iran's remote northwest.
title: World mourns tragic deaths of Iranian president and foreign minister

description: TEHRAN - In the aftermath of the tragic helicopter crash that claimed the lives of President Ebrahim Raisi and his delegation, Interim President Mohammad Mokhber has convened a meeting with the heads of the legislative and judicial branches of the Islamic Republic of Iran.
title: Interim president holds meeting with heads of govt. branches

description: TEHRAN - "Never in my life had I imagined that I would even meet a local official here, let alone meet the President of the country," that’s how a young worker of a remote palm plantation in the southern Iranian province of Bushehr expressed his shock at an unprecedented visit by President Ebrahim Raisi.
title: A tireless president

description: TEHRAN - Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, has extended his deepest condolences to the Iranian nation following the tragic martyrdom of President Ebrahim Raisi and his esteemed companions in a helicopter crash.
title: Iran lost sincere and valuable servant: Leader

description: TEHRAN- The tragic loss of President Ebrahim Raisi and his Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian has presented the nation with new challenges that resuscitated hope among adversaries about possibility of Iran plunging into a period of instability.
title: Iran stands strong

description: TEHRAN – Following the devastating helicopter crash that tragically claimed the lives of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and his accompanying delegation, people from all corners of Iran took to the streets to mourn the sudden and heartbreaking loss of the nation’s chief executive.
title: Iran grieves as helicopter crash claims lives of President, FM

description: TEHRAN – Funeral rites for Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and other state officials, killed in a helicopter crash on Sunday, will start on Tuesday in the northwestern city of Tabriz.
title: Funeral rites for Iranian president to start on Tuesday in Tabriz

description: TEHRAN- Copies of the selected Iranian children’s book, as part of the "The World Through Picture Books" program, have been sent to Japan and France, where they will be displayed at the International Library of Children's Literature in Tokyo and the National Library of France in Paris.
title: Iran's children’s literary gems to go on display in Tokyo, Paris

description: MASHHAD- Following the tragic death of President Ebrahim Raisi, the closing ceremony of the 21st edition of Imam Reza (AS) International Festival has been cancelled.
title: Imam Reza festival's closing ceremony cancelled over president's death

description: TEHRAN-The Persian translation of “Maigret and the St. Fiacre Case” written by the Belgian writer Georges Simenon has been released to bookstores across Iran.
title: New detective novel on inspector Maigret published in Persian

description: TEHRAN – FIFA President Gianni Infantino has sent heartfelt condolences to the Iranian people following passing of the country’s President Ebrahim Raisi.
title: FIFA President Infantino sends condolences on passing of Raisi

description: TEHRAN-The cinematheque of House of Cinema in Tehran will screen “La Strada,” a 1954 Italian drama film directed by Federico Fellini, on Wednesday.
title: House of Cinema cinematheque to show Fellini’s “La Strada”

description: TEHRAN – Abadan is about to embark on a groundbreaking venture with the construction of a snow park.
title: Scorching Abadan to offer vivid contrast for visitors

description: TEHRAN – In a momentous effort to preserve Semnan’s cultural legacy, documentation of handicraft skills has been commenced across the province for the very first time.
title: Semnan starts documenting handicrafts to preserve heritage

description: TEHRAN – Medical tourism in Iran has been steadily gaining momentum over the past couple of years, attracting patients from across the globe and particularly from the neighboring states.
title: Multifaceted benefits of choosing Iran for medical treatment

description: TEHRAN – Visiting ancient mosques as a sightseer offers a unique and enriching experience that goes beyond mere architectural admiration. These historic religious sites serve as living museums, preserving centuries of history, culture, and artistry.
title: Discover architectural splendor of Golpayegan mosque

description: TEHRAN – Honoring the martyrdom of Iranian President Seyyed Ebrahim Raisi in a helicopter crash, all the events planned to commemorate the national Cultural Heritage Week have been canceled.
title: All Cultural Heritage Week programs called off over President martyrdom

description: TEHRAN- Arghavan Theater in Tehran will host the play “The Lie” written by the French novelist and playwright Florian Zeller next week.
title: Florian Zeller’s “The Lie” to be staged at Arghavan Theater

description: MASHHAD- The dramatic arts section of the 21st edition of Imam Reza (AS) International Festival concluded with a grand ceremony at Shirin and Farhad Hall of the University of Medical Sciences in Mashhad on Sunday night.
title: Imam Reza dramatic arts festival wraps up

description: TEHRAN-Iranian cultural officials have, in separate messages, expressed condolences over the death of President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian along with a number of local officials in a tragic helicopter crash in the northwest of the country.
title: Cultural figures express condolences over death of President Raisi, local officials

description: TEHRAN – Amirhossein Alipour won a gold medal at the 2024 World Para Athletics Championships on Monday.
title: Iran’s Alipour takes gold at 2024 World Para Athletics

description: The International Criminal Court is seeking arrest warrants for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on charges of war crimes and crimes against humanity over the Gaza war, the court’s chief prosecutor Karim Khan told CNN’s Christiane Amanpour in an exclusive interview on Monday.
title: ICC seeks arrest warrant against Netanyahu for war crimes

description: TEHRAN – Some 90 percent of medical equipment used in hospitals is domestically manufactured.
title: 90% of hospital equipment is domestically made

description: TEHRAN –Since the beginning of the current water year (September 23, 2023), till May 18, precipitations have increased by 21 percent compared to the same period last year, according to Metrological Organization.
title: Rainfall increases by 21% compared to previous water year

description: TEHRAN –The significant and fast-paced growth in the number of knowledge-based companies with over 200 percent increase in their number just over the past year (March 2023 – March 2024), shows the solid foundation, dynamism, and growth of the country in innovation and technology and the productive atmosphere which have been made available in line with the goal of boosting domestic production with public participation.
title: Notable growth in knowledge-based companies

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s First Vice President Mohammad Mokhber takes over as interim president following the death of Ebrahim Raisi in a helicopter crash on Sunday afternoon.
title: Mokhber takes over as Iran’s interim president

description: BEIJING- China International Press Communication Center (CIPCC) organized a one-week internship program with China Global Television Network (CGTN) for over 100 journalists from more than 90 countries.
title: CIPCC organizes CGTN internship program for foreign media

description: TEHRAN – The Secretary General of the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) Haitham Al Ghais has issued a statement condoling the martyrdom of President Ebrahim Raisi.
title: OPEC secretary general condoles over martyrdom of President Raisi

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s National Productivity Symposium kicked off in capital Tehran on Monday in a ceremony attended by the head of the National Productivity Organization (NPO), IRNA reported.
title: Tehran hosting National Productivity symposium

description: TEHRAN - Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines, and Agriculture (ICCIMA) has issued a message condoling the martyrdom of President Ebrahim Raisi.
title: ICCIMA condoles over martyrdom of President Raisi

description: TEHRAN - The project commissioner of extraterritorial agriculture at Iran’s Ministry of Agriculture called on Iranian real and legal entities living in other countries to invest in extraterritorial cultivation.
title: Agriculture Ministry urges Iranians living abroad to invest in extraterritorial cultivation

description: TEHRAN – In a cabinet approval on Monday, Ali Bagheri Kani was appointed as caretaker foreign minister following the tragic death of Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian in a helicopter crash along with President Ebrahim Raisi on Sunday afternoon.
title: Ali Bagheri Kani appointed caretaker foreign minister

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Securities and Exchange Organization (SEO) has halted its activities over the martyrdom of President Ebrahim Raisi and his accompanying team in a helicopter crash a day earlier.
title: Iran’s stock market halts activities over Pres. Raisi’s martyrdom

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Minister of Energy Ali-Akbar Mehrabian has said that the Islamic Republic stands among the top four countries in the world in the field of dam construction as it meets 95% of its needs in dam construction, irrigation network development, and hydropower plant construction.
title: Iran among top four countries in dam building: energy minister

description: TEHRAN -  Iranian Oil Minister Javad Oji inaugurated several oil refining projects in the northwestern province of Eastern Azerbaijan on Sunday, 19 May.
title: Oji inaugurates several oil projects in northwestern Iran

description: TEHRAN- The Leader of the Islamic Revolution has issued a message of condolence over the death of President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian along with a nubmer of local offficials in a tragic helicopter crash in northwestern Iran.
title: Leader declares five days of national mourning over loss of Raisi, FM

description: TEHRAN – All sports competitions in Iran have been canceled as a sign of mourning on the occasion of the crash of the helicopter carrying the President of Iran Ibrahim Raisi, Hossein Amir Abdollahian, the Iranian Foreign Minister, and other officials.
title: Iran’s sports competitions canceled following martyrdom of Raisi

description: TEHRAN - The flag of Iran was lowered to half-mast at the national Olympic and Paralympic committees.
title: Flag lowered to half-mast at Iran’s Olympic, Paralympic Committees

description: TEHRAN- Over the course of his decades-long public service, President Ebrahim Raisi served in numerous important positions across several government branches.
title: Who is Ebrahim Raisi?

description: TEHRAN – In accordance with Articles 130 and 131 of the first edition of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Iran (adopted in 1979), the first vice president – who is now Mohammad Mokhber – steps in and assume the duties of the president if the president is unable to fulfill his legal duties due to dismissal, resignation, absence, illness, or death.
title: Iran constitution says Vice President will take over in case of President’s death

description: TEHRAN- Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian lost his life during the helicopter crash along with President Ebrahim Raisi.
title: Amir Abdollahian, a career diplomat
14776-Second Edition

description: TEHRAN – In a tragic helicopter crash, Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian, alongside other officials, lost their lives en route to the provincial capital city of Tabriz.
title: Martyrdom in the line of duty
